The rusted anvil or Lumbridge anvil is a special anvil located in Lumbridge used to smith bronze items through the Smithing skill. The bronze anvil is identified with an anvil icon on the minimap and world map.

The rusted anvil can be used to smith bronze items by either left-clicking on the anvil, right-clicking on the anvil and selecting the smith option, or by using a bronze bar on the anvil. Using the rusted anvil requires a hammer to be in the player's inventory. When using the bronze anvil, a selection screen will come up that looks similar to that of a normal anvil, with the option to smith only bronze items.

If a player attempts to use a metal other than bronze with the anvil, they are told You can only use bronze bars to smith on this anvil. or You need a bronze bar to smith equipment on this anvil. depending on if the player uses the metal bar on the anvil or if the player left-clicks on the anvil, respectively.

There is no competition for the anvil (since multiple players can use an anvil concurrently).

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The rusted anvil was implemented after a suggestion by reddit user u/Tizaki.[1]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Tizaki. The Lumbridge Furnace should have an anvil that allows you to smith Bronze items.. Reddit. 21 April 2020. (Archived from the original on 14 July 2020.)
